vyrasti_kotyat_i_skresti_ikh_ne_zabyvai_: Grow the kittens and crossbreed them. Do not forget to feed the pets after every season ends.

davai_ikh_prodaim_vernis_na_glavnyi_ekra: Let's sell them. Return to the main screen and enter the pet shop.
perenesi_vsekh_kotyat_iz_svoei_vitrine_v: Move all kittens from your showcase to the deal zone and press the «Send» button.
srazu_posle_pokupki_kotiki_syty_i_kormit: Right after purchase the cats are fed, and you do not need to feed them. It is time to buy a house for them. Return to the main screen.

chtoby_reshit_prakticheskoe_zadanie_posm: To complete the practical task, look at how we calculated when selling the black kittens.
esli_by_ty_kupil_dve_pary_kotyat_to_deng: If you had bought two pairs of kittens, you would calculate the money spent on cats like this:
nakormi_koshek_posle_etogo_ikh_mozhno_bu: Feed the cats. After that they can be crossbred to produce offspring. Hungry cats cannot be crossbred.
knopka_skrestit_dostupna_esli_kotiki_nak: The «Crossbreed» button is available if the cats are fed and housed together. Press the «Crossbreed» button and end the season to receive kittens.
zarabotano_no_esli_by_my_kupili_paru_dor: Earned, but if we had bought a pair of expensive gray kittens, we would not be able to feed them. Let's try: buy a gray male kitten and a gray female kitten in the shop.
k_sozhaleniyu_golodnye_kotiki_sbezhali_i: Unfortunately, the hungry cats ran away and did not produce offspring. This example showed how important it is to calculate expenses in advance.
sezonu_kupi_i_vyrasti_kotyat_poluchi_ot_: By the season, buy and grow kittens, get offspring from them, then sell newborn kittens to pet shops.
